actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Recognizing the remarkable achievements and patriotic service of late Michigan native Captain Claude A. Rowe, Jr., the only known member of the famed Tuskegee Airmen authorized to fly for two Allied countries during World War II.

summary.text:
Honorable Captain Claude A. Rowe, Jr. Resolution

This resolution memorializes Captain Claude A. Rowe Jr. for his record of personal and professional achievements, devotion to his family and friends, and loyalty and love for his country.

titles.title: Recognizing the remarkable achievements and patriotic service of late Michigan native Captain Claude A. Rowe, Jr., the only known member of the famed Tuskegee Airmen authorized to fly for two Allied countries during World War II.
